value:
$WmMPID_エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_Normal,Face|This is unexpected. How did we land
ourselves in this predicament?$k$p$WmMPID_ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_Normal,Face|I'm just glad you three aren't hurt.
Those soldiers seem dangerous,
whoever they are.$k$p$WmMPID_ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Normal,Face|Agreed. They do not look like bandits,
but they're not from any army that
I could recognize.$k$p$WmMPID_エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_Normal,Face|It's not only the enemies—even the
landscape is alien. We don't seem to
be in the forests of Garreg Mach.$k$p$WmMPID_ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_F_Normal,Face|An unfamiliar enemy in an unfamiliar
forest. Just what is happening here,
I wonder?$k$p$WmMPID_エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_Normal,Face|Perhaps there are locals nearby who
can apprise us of our situation. First,
however...$k$p$WmMPID_ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Normal,Face|Yes. I had the same thought. Claude,
where exactly are you going?$k$p$WmMPID_クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Normal,Face|Oh, you noticed! Your Highnesses
were so busy conferring, I thought I'd
have time to make a strategic retreat.$k$p$WmMPID_ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Normal,Face|A "strategic retreat," hm? That has a
familiar ring to it.$k$p$WmMPID_エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_Normal,Face|Why am I not surprised? Claude, that
is not an option here. We do not even
know where we are.$k$p$WmMPID_クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Normal,Face|Fine, fine. But we're not going to find
help by standing around here, waiting
for someone to—$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Hello, strangers! Did I overhear you
say you needed help?$k$p$WmMPID_エーデルガルト,ch17_02_Edelgardr_F_Normal,Face|...You were saying, Claude?$k$p$WmMPID_ディミトリ,ch17_03_Dimitri_M_Normal,Face|We were talking rather loudly,
I suppose.$k$p$WmMPID_クロード,ch17_04_Claude_M_Normal,Face|Well, how do you like that! The gods
of fortune are smiling on us today.
Wouldn't you agree, Teach?$k$p
